definitions: 気筒[きとう] (n, ctr) cylinder
亀頭[きとう] (n) glans (esp. glans penis)
祈祷[きとう] (n, vs) prayer, grace (at meals),exorcism
帰投[きとう] (n, vs) return to base (of soldiers, military aircraft or ships)
帰島[きとう] (n, vs) return to an island
季冬[きとう] (n) end of winter,twelfth month of the lunar calendar
飢凍[きとう] (n, vs) starving and freezing to death
既倒[きとう] (n) falling suddenly
english: Well now, make yourselves at home.
japanese: まあ、てきとうにくつろいでおくれよ

definitions: 寛ぐ[くつろぐ] (v5g, vi) to relax, to feel at home
english: Well now, make yourselves at home.
japanese: まあ、てきとうにくつろいでおくれよ

definitions: 望む[のぞむ] (v5m, vt) to desire,to wish for, to expect,to see, to command (a view of)
english: That's what AERIS wanted…
japanese: AERISが望んだことだよ……

definitions: 母親[ははおや] (n, adj-no) mother
english: What did you say? But, aren't you her mother?
japanese: ……なんだとさ、だって？あんた母親だろ？

definitions: 戦地[せんち] (n) front (in battle)
english: …during the war. My husband was sent to the front. Some far away place called Wutai.
japanese: ……戦争中でね。わたしの夫は戦地に行ってた。ウータイという遠い国さ

definitions: 五[ウー] (num) five
english: …during the war. My husband was sent to the front. Some far away place called Wutai.
japanese: ……戦争中でね。わたしの夫は戦地に行ってた。ウータイという遠い国さ

definitions: 対[たい] (n, conj) opposite, opposition,versus, vs., v.,to (e.g. "winning a game five to three"),equal footing, equal terms,against ..., anti-, toward ..., to ...
鯛[たい] (n) sea bream (Sparidae), porgy,tai (species of reddish-brown Pacific sea bream, Pagrus major)
泰[タイ] (n) Thailand
帯[たい] (n-suf) band (e.g. conduction, valence), belt (e.g. Van-Allen, asteroid, etc.)
体[たい] (n, n-suf) body, physique, posture,shape, form, style,substance, identity, reality,field,counter for humanoid forms (e.g. dolls, statues, corpses, etc.),typeface, type
タイ (n) tie
隊[たい] (n, n-suf) party, group, crew, team, body,company (of troops), corps, unit, squad
他意[たい] (n) ill will, malice, another intention, secret purpose, ulterior motive, fickleness, double-mindedness
たい (suf, adj-i) want to ... do something, would like to ...,indicates emphasis,very ...
胎[たい] (n) womb
態[たい] (n, n-suf) condition, figure, appearance,voice
袋[たい] (suf, ctr) counter for things inside a bag
台[たい] (n, n-pref, n-suf) Taiwan
堆[たい] (n) bank (river, lake)
english: …during the war. My husband was sent to the front. Some far away place called Wutai.
japanese: ……戦争中でね。わたしの夫は戦地に行ってた。ウータイという遠い国さ

definitions: 迎える[むかえる] (v1, vt) to go out to meet,to receive, to welcome, to greet, to salute, to hail, to reach, to approach, to enter (a phase, era, etc.),to accept (e.g. as a member of a group or family),to call for, to summon, to invite,to approach (a certain time, a point in one's life, etc.)
english: One day, I went to the station because I got a letter saying he was coming home on leave.
japanese: ある日、休暇で帰ってくるっててがみをもらったからわたしは駅までむかえにいったのさ

definitions: 懐く[なつく] (v5k, vt) to become emotionally attached (to), to take (to)
english: AERIS and I became close very quickly. That child loved to talk. She used to talk to me about everything.
japanese: AERISはすぐにわたしになついてくれた。よくしゃべる子でねえ。いろいろ話してくれたよ

definitions: 研究所[けんきゅうしょ] (n) research establishment, research institute, laboratory
english: She told me how she escaped from some kind of research laboratory, and that her mother had already returned to the Planet, so she wasn't lonely…many other things.
japanese: どこかの研究所みたいなところから母親と逃げ出したこと。お母さんは星に帰っただけだからさびしくなんかない……いろいろね

definitions: 夜空[よぞら] (n) night sky
english: I didn't know what she meant. I asked if she meant a star in the sky,
japanese: わたしには意味がわからなかったよ。夜空の星かって聞いたらちがう、この星だっていわれて……

definitions: 泣く[なく] (v5k) to cry, to weep, to sob, to howl
english: Please don't cry.
japanese: 泣かないでね

definitions: 戦死[せんし] (n, vs) death in battle
english: Several days later… we received a notice saying my husband died…
japanese: それから何日かして…夫が戦死したという知らせが…届いたんだ…

definitions: 知らせ[しらせ] (n) news, word, tidings, notice, notification, information,omen
english: Several days later… we received a notice saying my husband died…
japanese: それから何日かして…夫が戦死したという知らせが…届いたんだ…

definitions: 届く[とどく] (v5k, vi) to reach, to arrive, to get through, to get at,to be attentive, to pay attention,to be delivered, to carry (e.g. sound)
english: Several days later… we received a notice saying my husband died…
japanese: それから何日かして…夫が戦死したという知らせが…届いたんだ…

definitions: 返す[かえす] (suf, v5s) to return (something), to restore, to put back,to turn over, to turn upside down, to overturn,to pay back, to retaliate, to reciprocate,to repeat ..., to do ... back
english: We want you to return AERIS to us. We've been searching for her for a long time.
japanese: AERISを返してほしいのです。ずいぶん探しました

definitions: 至上[しじょう] (n) supremacy
english: The Ancients will lead us to a land of supreme happiness.
japanese: 古代種は至上の幸福が約束された土地へ我々を導いてくれるのです

definitions: 貧しい[まずしい] (adj-i) poor, needy,lacking (quantity and quality-wise), poor, scanty, skimpy, slight, inadequate
english: AERIS will be able to bring happiness to all those in the slums.
japanese: AERISはこのまずしいスラムの人々に幸福を与えることができるのです

definitions: 与える[あたえる] (v1, vt) to give (esp. to someone of lower status), to bestow, to grant, to confer, to present, to award,to provide, to afford, to offer, to supply,to assign,to cause,to pass (a variable to a function)
english: AERIS will be able to bring happiness to all those in the slums.
japanese: AERISはこのまずしいスラムの人々に幸福を与えることができるのです

definitions: 是非とも[ぜひとも] (adv) by all means (with sense of not taking "no" for an answer)
english: That is why Shinra would like AERIS's cooperation.
japanese: ですから我々神羅カンパニーはぜひともAERISの協力を……

definitions: 一生[いっしょう] (adj-no) whole life, a lifetime, all through life, one existence, a generation, an age, the whole world, the era,(the only, the greatest, etc.) of one's life
english: She tried so hard to hide it, so I acted as though I never noticed.
japanese: 一生けんめい、かくそうとしていたからわたしは気がつかないふりをしていたけどね

懸命[けんめい] (adj-na, n) eager, earnest, strenuous, fervent, assiduous, with utmost effort
件名[けんめい] (n) subject, title,subject (of an email), subject line
english: She tried so hard to hide it, so I acted as though I never noticed.
japanese: 一生けんめい、かくそうとしていたからわたしは気がつかないふりをしていたけどね

definitions: 気がつく[きがつく] (exp, v5k) to notice, to become aware, to perceive, to realize, to realise,to be scrupulous, to be attentive,to recover consciousness, to come to oneself
english: She tried so hard to hide it, so I acted as though I never noticed.
japanese: 一生けんめい、かくそうとしていたからわたしは気がつかないふりをしていたけどね

definitions: 振り[ふり] (n) swing, shake, wave, swinging,appearance, behaviour,pretence (pretense), show, pretending (to),going to restaurant, hotel etc. without a reservation or introduction,move (dance), postures,lead in (e.g. to a running joke, asking a question), lead up,unsewn part of a hanging sleeve on a traditional Japanese woman's garment,counter for swords, blades, etc.,not wearing underwear or pants
不利[ふり] (n, adj-na) disadvantage, handicap, unfavorable position
不理[ふり] (adj-na, n) unreasonable, irrational, illogical
不離[ふり] (n) inseparability
降り[ふり] (n) rainfall, snowfall,alighting, descending
浮利[ふり] (n) easy money, quick profit
english: She tried so hard to hide it, so I acted as though I never noticed.
japanese: 一生けんめい、かくそうとしていたからわたしは気がつかないふりをしていたけどね

definitions: 続ける[つづける] (v1, vt, aux-v) to continue, to keep up, to keep on
english: It's amazing how she's avoided the Shinra for all these years…
japanese: よく何年も神羅から逃げつづけることができたな

definitions: 手荒[てあら] (adj-na, n) violent, rough
english: The Shinra need her, so I guess they wouldn't harm her.
japanese: 神羅はAERISの協力が必要だったから手荒なマネはできなかったんだろうね

definitions: 引き換える[ひきかえる] (v1, vt) to exchange (things), to convert
english: She decided to go to the Shinra in exchange for the little girl's safety.
japanese: 女の子の無事と引き替えに自分が神羅に行くことになったんだ

definitions: 父親[ちちおや] (n) father
english: You're her father!? How in the world could you ever leave a child alone like that!?
japanese: あんたが父親かい！？あんた、娘をほったらかして何をやってるんだい！？

definitions: 放ったらかす[ほったらかす] (v5s) to neglect, to leave undone, to lay aside
english: You're her father!? How in the world could you ever leave a child alone like that!?
japanese: あんたが父親かい！？あんた、娘をほったらかして何をやってるんだい！？

definitions: ぐるぐる (adv, adv-to) (turning) round and round, in circles,wrapping around, winding around
english: See? I'm goin' in circles, now.
japanese: な？　グルグルまわっちまうんだ

definitions: 髭[ひげ] (n) moustache, beard, whiskers,whiskers (on a cat, etc.), feelers (on an insect, etc.), (chin) tuft,extremely short pulse appearing on an electrical signal
卑下[ひげ] (n, vs, adj-no) self-abasement, humility, self-depreciation
english: Daddy, don't cry. Your whiskers hurt!
japanese: とうちゃん泣いちゃダメだよ。おヒゲ、いたいよ！

definitions: 黙る[だまる] (v5r, vi) to be silent, to say nothing
english: If the Shinra're involved, I ain't stayin' here! I'm comin', too!
japanese: それに相手が神羅となれば黙っちゃいられねえ！オレも行くぜ！

definitions: 管[かん] (n, n-suf) pipe, tube
勘[かん] (n) perception, intuition, the sixth sense

冠[かんむり] (n) traditional cap worn by Shinto clergy and courtiers,crown, diadem, coronet,top kanji radical,first verse of a haikai, etc.,best, peerless, first,name, title, named sponsorship of a program, event, team, etc.

間[かん] (n, suf) interval, period of time,among, between, inter-

寒[かん] (n) midwinter, cold season, coldest days of the year

かん (adv, adv-to) ding, chime (sound of a bell or a small gong)

環[かん] (n-pref) ring, band, rim,ring,circum-

稈[かん] (n) culm (hollow stem of a grass)

寛[かん] (n, adj-na) lenient, gentle

閑[かん] (n) spare time, free time, leisure

簡[かん] (n) brevity, simplicity

japanese: ドンカン！

definitions: Ｆ[エフ] (n) F, f

japanese: それに今は思いきり身体を動かしたい気分なの

japanese: 『かばう』のマテリアを手にいれた！

japanese: よくわからないたとえだったがBARRET、あんたの気持ちはわかった

japanese: あのプロペラが回りそうだな

japanese: なんで……わざわざ……こんな……くろうを……

japanese: あんたでも他人のために戦うことがあるんだな。見直したぜ

japanese: あんたでも他人のために戦うことがあるんだな。見直したぜ

definitions: 六[ろく] (num) six
鹿[しか] (n) deer (esp. the sika deer, Cervus nippon), cervid
碌[ろく] (adj-na, n) satisfactory, decent, good, proper, worthy
録[ろく] (n, suf) record, transcript
禄[ろく] (n) stipend, reward
english: That Shinra… They're just no damn good.
japanese: やっぱり、し、神羅なんてロクなやつじゃねえぜ……！

definitions: 父ちゃん[とうちゃん] (n) dad, daddy, papa, pa, pop
english: Marlene, daddy wanted to see your face one more time…
japanese: マリン、父ちゃんはもう一度お前に会いたかった……

definitions: 右腕[みぎうで] (n) right arm,right-hand man, right hand, right-hand person,right-handed pitcher

japanese: ん、んなコト言ったってオレは、み、右腕以外は普通の体なんだぜ……

definitions: 御免[ごめん] (n) your pardon, sorry, no thanks,not wanting, objecting to, being fed up with, wishing to avoid,permission, leave, dismissal, discharge

japanese: か……階段なんて……もう見るのもゴメンだ……

english: Every floor above the 60th is special and not easy to get to even for employees.
japanese: このビルの６０階から上は特別ブロックとかで社員でも簡単には入れないってな

definitions: 社員[しゃいん] (n) company employee,member of a corporation, company stockholder (esp. in legal contexts)
english: Every floor above the 60th is special and not easy to get to even for employees.
japanese: このビルの６０階から上は特別ブロックとかで社員でも簡単には入れないってな

definitions: 多い[おおい] (adj-i) many, numerous, a lot,large quantity, large amount,frequent, common
おい (pn) hey!, oi!, ahoy!,I, me
覆い[おおい] (n) cover, mantle, shroud, hood
馬肥やし[うまごやし] (n) toothed medick (Medicago polymorpha), hairy medick, bur clover,white clover (Trifolium repens)
大い[おおい] (n, adj-na) greater (of equal court ranks), upper, senior,a great deal, very much
english: The security's pretty light now. Alright, let's go!!
japanese: 今なら警備にもスキがある。おおし、いくぜっ！！

definitions: 正面[しょうめん] (n, adj-no, pref) front, frontage, facade, main
真面[まとも] (adj-na, n) the front,honesty, uprightness, directness,decency, normality
english: Wait a second! You're not thinking of just going right through the main entrance, are you?
japanese: ちょっとまってよ！まさか正面からのりこむつもり？

definitions: ケチる (v5r) to be stingy, to scrimp
english: Well what else does it look like!? I'm gonna kick some Shinra butt and…
japanese: 決まってるだろ！神羅のやつらをけちらして……

definitions: 愚図愚図[ぐずぐず] (adj-na) slowly, tardily, dawdling, lingering, hesitantly,complaining, grumbling,unsettled (e.g. weather),loose, slackened
english: Ain't gonna be no other way! If we keep wastin' time like this, AERIS'll…
japanese: そんなコトやってられねえ！グズグズしてたらAERISだって……

definitions: 突っ込む[つっこむ] (v5m, vi) to thrust (something) into (something), to cram, to stuff, to shove,to plunge into, to charge into, to rush into, to ram into, to crash into,to delve into (a matter), to go into depth, to get to the heart (of something),to press (someone) about, to point out (e.g. an inconsistency), to question sharply, to grill,to get involved with, to meddle in, to poke one's nose into,to riposte, to retort, to quip
english: Let's bust on in!
japanese: つっこむぞ！

definitions: 慎重[しんちょう] (adj-na, n) careful, cautious, prudent, discreet, deliberate
身長[しんちょう] (n) height (of body), stature
新調[しんちょう] (n, vs) brand new
伸張[しんちょう] (n, vs, adj-no) expansion, extension, elongation, stretching, uncompression
清朝[しんちょう] (n) Qing Dynasty, Ch'ing Dynasty, Manchu Dynasty
深長[しんちょう] (adj-na, n) profound
晨朝[じんじょう] (n) around six o'clock AM, dawn service
english: See? Let's be careful and find a different route!
japanese: でしょ？こんな時こそしんちょうに他のルートを探しましょ！

definitions: シスター (n) sister,(Catholic) nun,female partner in a homosexual relationship
english: No, no! The Sister Ray's not this way!
japanese: ちゃうちゃう！シスター・レイは、こっちやない！

definitions: 礼[れい] (n) thanks, gratitude,manners, etiquette,bow,reward, gift,ceremony, ritual
鈴[すず] (n) bell (often globular)
零[れい] (n, adj-no) zero, nought
例[れい] (n, n-pref, adj-no) custom, practice, habit, usual,said, aforementioned,instance, example, case, illustration, usage,precedent
令[れい] (n, n-suf) command, order, dictation
霊[れい] (n) soul, spirit, departed soul, ghost
レイ (n) lei (garland of flowers),lei (plural of leu; currency of Rumania and Moldova)
冷[れい] (n) cold, cool,cold sake
齢[れい] (n) instar
english: No, no! The Sister Ray's not this way!
japanese: ちゃうちゃう！シスター・レイは、こっちやない！

definitions: ロビー (n) lobby, lounge
english: Shinra Bldg. 1f. lobby
japanese: 神羅ビル・１階ロビー

definitions: 受付[うけつけ] (n, vs) reception (desk), information desk,receipt, acceptance
english: Receptionist
japanese: 受付

definitions: アポイントメント (n) appointment
english: Excuse me! If you don't have an appointment, you'll have to…
japanese: ちょっと、困ります！アポイントメントのない方はこちらで……

definitions: 此方[こちら] (pn) this way (direction close to the speaker or towards the speaker), this direction,here (place close to the speaker or where the speaker is),this one (something physically close to the speaker),I, me, we, us,this person (someone physically close to the speaker and of equal or higher status)
english: Excuse me! If you don't have an appointment, you'll have to…
japanese: ちょっと、困ります！アポイントメントのない方はこちらで……

definitions: 割る[わる] (v5r, vt) to divide,to cut, to halve, to separate, to split, to rip,to break, to crack, to smash,to dilute,to fall below,to discount,to step over (a line, etc.)
悪[わる] (n) bad thing, bad person
english: I don't need no appointment… This is a 'mergency!
japanese: わりいな、ちっとばかし急な用件でよ

definitions: 用件[ようけん] (n) business, thing to be done, something that should be performed, information that should be conveyed
english: I don't need no appointment… This is a 'mergency!
japanese: わりいな、ちっとばかし急な用件でよ

definitions: 引っ込む[ひっこむ] (v5m, vi) to draw back, to sink, to cave in,to be set back (e.g. from a road),to withdraw (e.g. from the public eye), to retire to (somewhere), to stay indoors, to butt out, to stay out of it
english: And anyone who don't wanna get their face bashed in better git outta the way!!
japanese: ケガしたくなかったらひっこんでな！！

definitions: ショップ (n) shop
english: Shinra Bldg. 2f. Shop
japanese: 神羅ビル２階ショップ

definitions: 車[くるま] (n) car, automobile, vehicle,wheel
俥[くるま] (n) rickshaw, jinrikisha
english: Honey…would you buy me that car!
japanese: ネエ～新しいクルマ買ってェ～

definitions: 新車[しんしゃ] (n) new car
english: But baby, it's way too expensive.
japanese: そんなこと言ったって新車は高いしなあ……

definitions: 冷え[ひえ] (n) chilliness, coldness
稗[ひえ] (n) barnyard millet (Echinochloa esculenta), Japanese millet, sanwa millet
english: Hh, hey!
japanese: ヒ、ヒエ～！

definitions: レジ (n) (cash) register,cashier
english: Please take all purchases to the register
japanese: え～、お買い物はレジの向こうからどうぞ

definitions: 強盗[ごうとう] (n) robber, mugger,robbery, burglary
english: I don't want your money. AVALANCHE ain't no packa criminals.
japanese: カンチガイするな。アバランチは強盗じゃねえ

definitions: ボス (n) boss, leader, head,difficult enemy in a video game, usu. found at the end of a level or game
english: We jus' want back what your boss stole from us.
japanese: ……アンタんとこのボスにとられたものを取り返しにきただけだ

definitions: 取り返す[とりかえす] (v5s, vt) to get back, to regain, to recover, to make up (for), to catch up on
english: We jus' want back what your boss stole from us.
japanese: ……アンタんとこのボスにとられたものを取り返しにきただけだ

definitions: 動向[どうこう] (n) trend, tendency, movement, attitude
同好[どうこう] (n) similar tastes
同校[どうこう] (n) same school
同行[どうこう] (n) accompanying, travelling together, traveling together,same bank
瞳孔[どうこう] (n) pupil (of the eye)
銅鉱[どうこう] (n) copper ore
どうこう (adv) this and that, one thing or another
english: We ain't gonna hurt you. We might even pay ya, if ya help us.
japanese: アンタをどうこうする気はねえ。金だってちゃんと払うぜ

definitions: 払う[はらう] (v5u, vt) to pay (e.g. money, bill),to brush off, to wipe away, to clear away, to dust off, to cut off (e.g. branches),to drive away (e.g. one's competitors),to sell off (something unneeded), to dispose of,to pay (e.g. attention), to show (e.g. respect, concern),to make (e.g. effort, sacrifice), to expend, to exert,to move out (of one's own place), to vacate,to sweep (e.g. one's legs), to knock aside,to make a sweeping stroke (in Japanese calligraphy),to reset (an abacus)
english: We ain't gonna hurt you. We might even pay ya, if ya help us.
japanese: アンタをどうこうする気はねえ。金だってちゃんと払うぜ

definitions: 無人[むじん] (n, adj-na) unmanned, uninhabited, unattended, deserted,shorthandedness, lack of help
english: Welcome… to the fully automated store. Place your order…now.
japanese: ……いらっしゃいませ。無人販売機が御用をうけたまわります

definitions: 御用[ごよう] (n) your order, your business, official business,arrest, apprehension, capture
english: Welcome… to the fully automated store. Place your order…now.
japanese: ……いらっしゃいませ。無人販売機が御用をうけたまわります

definitions: 承る[うけたまわる] (v5r, vt) to hear, to be told, to know,to receive (order), to undertake, to comply, to take (a reservation, etc.)
english: Welcome… to the fully automated store. Place your order…now.
japanese: ……いらっしゃいませ。無人販売機が御用をうけたまわります

definitions: パイル (n) pile (fabric, nuclear reactor, structural support, etc.)
english: Received "Pile Bunker"!
japanese: 『パイルバンカー』を手にいれた！

definitions: バンカー (n) banker,bunker
english: Received "Pile Bunker"!
japanese: 『パイルバンカー』を手にいれた！

definitions: 茹だる[ゆだる] (v5r, vi) to boil, to seethe,to be oppressed by heat
english: This is the real thing. Don't let your guard down.
japanese: ここからが本番だ。ゆだんするな

definitions: パス (n, vs) path,pass (e.g. skipping a move, passing an examination, ticket to allow entry, etc.),pass
english: You…again?  Uh, I'll pass.
japanese: ま、まだのってらしたんですか……え、ええ、私は今回もパスしますです

definitions: エレベーター (n) elevator, lift,elevator (aviation)
english: Elevator
japanese: エレベーター

definitions: とっとと (adv) quickly, at once, right away, hurriedly
english: Yeah, that's right! Let's go on!
japanese: おう、だよな！とっとと先を急ごうぜ！

definitions: 排除[はいじょ] (n, vs, adj-no) exclusion, removal, rejection, elimination, abatement, lifting (sanctions, etc.)
english: Destroy the intruders!
japanese: 侵入者を排除しろ！

definitions: 立ち去る[たちさる] (v5r, vi) to leave, to depart, to take one's leave
english: Your kind don't belong here! Go on, get out!
japanese: おまえたちのような者が入れる場所ではない！さっさと立ち去れ！

definitions: 物陰[ものかげ] (n) place hidden from view, cover, shelter, hiding place
物影[ものかげ] (n) form, shape, figure
english: Stay in the shadows!
japanese: ものかげに隠れながら進むのよ！

definitions: 隠れる[かくれる] (v1, vi) to hide, to be hidden, to conceal oneself, to disappear
english: Stay in the shadows!
japanese: ものかげに隠れながら進むのよ！

definitions: 逸らす[そらす] (v5s, vt) to turn away (one's eyes, face, etc.), to avert, to divert (e.g. one's attention), to evade (e.g a question), to change (e.g. the subject),to displease, to annoy, to offend, to upset,to miss (the target, ball, etc.)
反らす[そらす] (v5s, vt) to bend, to warp, to curve
english: When those guards turn around, MOVE!
japanese: 警備のやつらが目をそらした時がチャンスだぜ

definitions: チャンス (n) chance, opportunity
english: When those guards turn around, MOVE!
japanese: 警備のやつらが目をそらした時がチャンスだぜ
